Name: Son of Scoregasm
About the game: Only you can destroy the evil space baddies and rescue the King of the Earth's beloved biscuit tin! Blast your way through 28 varied levels full of enemies, traps, lasers and explosions in Son of Scoregasm, the fantastic new shoot-em-up from Charlie's Games. Save the galaxy, rescue the biscuits, defeat the boss contraptions and challenge the world on the online leaderboards. Features Fun and frantic twin stick gameplay 28 varied levels 7 different endings Expert difficulty for expert players Full Controller support Online rankings Biscuits!
